title: Terms of Endearment
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
Best Actor in a Supporting Role
Best Writing, Screenplay Based on Material from Another Medium
description: Follows the hard-to-please Aurora and her daughter Emma through their years of love, heartbreak, and laughter.

title: The Right Stuff
description: The story of the original Mercury 7 astronauts and their macho, seat-of-the-pants approach to the space program.

title: Return of the Jedi
description: After a daring mission to rescue Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the Rebels dispatch to Endor to destroy the second Death Star.

title: Scarface
description: In 1980 Miami, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel and succumbs to greed.

title: Tender Mercies
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
Best Writing, Screenplay Written Directly for the Screen
description: A broken-down, middle-aged country singer gets a new wife, reaches out to his long-lost daughter, and tries to put his troubled life back together.

title: A Christmas Story
description: In the 1940s, a young boy named Ralphie attempts to convince his parents, his teacher and Santa that a Red Ryder BB gun really is the perfect Christmas gift.

title: The Big Chill
description: A group of seven former college friends gather for a weekend reunion at a South Carolina winter house after the funeral of another of their college friends.

title: Yentl
description: A Jewish girl disguises herself as a boy to enter religious training.

title: WarGames
description: A young computer whiz connects into a top secret super-computer which has complete control over the U.S. nuclear arsenal. It challenges him to a game between America and Russia, and he innocently starts the countdown to World War 3.

title: Flashdance
description: A Pittsburgh woman with two jobs as a welder and an exotic dancer wants to get into ballet school.

title: Trading Places
description: A snobbish investor and a wily street con artist find their positions reversed as part of a bet by two callous millionaires.

title: The Dresser
description: A personal assistant struggles to get a deteriorating veteran actor through a difficult performance of King Lear.

title: Silkwood
description: A worker at a plutonium processing plant is purposefully contaminated, psychologically tortured and possibly murdered to prevent her from exposing worker safety violations at the plant.

title: Educating Rita
description: An alcoholic professor is hired to tutor a working-class girl who is looking to improve herself.

title: Risky Business
description: A Chicago teenager is looking for fun at home while his parents are away, but the situation quickly gets out of hand.

title: Videodrome
description: A programmer at a UHF television station creates a show featuring torture and murder, but the images begin to alter his perception of reality.

title: Local Hero
description: An American oil company sends a man to Scotland to buy up an entire village for a refinery. But things don't go as expected.

title: Nostalghia
description: A Russian poet and his interpreter travel to Italy to research the life of an 18th-century composer.

title: Monty Python's The Meaning of Life
description: The Monty Python team attempt to solve the most important question on Earth: what is the meaning of life?

title: Zelig
description: "Documentary" about a man who can look and act like whoever he is around.

title: The Dead Zone
description: A man awakens from a coma to discover he has a psychic ability to foresee the future when he touches people.

title: The Outsiders
description: The rivalry between two gangs, the poor Greasers and the rich Socs, only heats up when one gang member kills a member of the other.

title: Rumble Fish
description: Rusty James, an absent-minded street thug struggles to live up to his legendary older brother's reputation, and longs for the days when gang warfare was going on.

title: National Lampoon's Vacation
description: The Griswold family's cross-country drive to the Walley World theme park proves to be much more arduous than they ever anticipated.

title: Octopussy
description: A fake Fabergé egg, and a fellow Agent's death, lead James Bond to uncover an international jewel smuggling operation, headed by the mysterious Octopussy, being used to disguise a nuclear attack on N.A.T.O. forces.

title: Never Say Never Again
description: A SPECTRE agent has stolen two American nuclear warheads, and James Bond must find their targets before they are detonated.

title: Christine
description: A nerdish boy buys a strange car with an evil mind of its own and his nature starts to change to reflect it.

title: Bad Boys
description: Mick O'Brien is a Chicago street thug sent to a juvenile corrections facility after accidentally killing a rival's younger brother.

title: Blue Thunder
description: The pilot of an experimental police helicopter learns the sinister implications of the new vehicle.

title: Sudden Impact
description: Harry Callahan returns to catch a serial killer who is targeting the men who gang raped her and her sister.

title: Gorky Park
description: A Moscow police officer investigates a triple homicide and stumbles upon a high-level international political conspiracy.

title: Under Fire
description: Three journalists in a romantic triangle are involved in political intrigue during the last days of the corrupt Somoza regime in Nicaragua before it falls to a popular revolution in 1979.

title: Testament
description: The life of a suburban American family is ripped apart when a nuclear attack strikes.

title: Cross Creek
description: In the 1920s, aspiring author Marjorie Kinnan Rawlings moves from New York to a neglected orange grove in the Florida bayou.

title: Reuben, Reuben
description: An alcoholic Scottish poet, devoid of responsibility, settles in a New England college town where he exploits the locals.

title: Star 80
description: A sleazy promoter discovers a fresh-faced innocent and guides her to become a Playmate of the Year, but his jealousy and insecurity eventually lead to tragedy.

title: Merry Christmas Mr. Lawrence
description: During WWII, a British colonel tries to bridge the cultural divides between a British POW and the Japanese camp commander in order to avoid bloodshed.

title: Project A
description: In late 19th Century Hong Kong the British may rule the land, but the pirates rule the waters. One Coast Guard officer is determined to change that, no matter the cost.

title: The Ballad of Narayama
description: In a poor 19th-century rural Japanese village, everyone who reaches the age of 70 must be carried up the mountain to die.

title: Pauline at the Beach
description: Young Pauline learns about love from her older cousin, who is a flirt.

title: L'Argent
description: A forged 500-franc note is cynically passed from person to person and shop to shop, until it falls into the hands of a genuine innocent who doesn't see it for what it is.

title: Sans Soleil
description: A woman narrates the thoughts of a world traveler, meditations on time and memory expressed in words and images from places as far-flung as Japan, Guinea-Bissau, Iceland, and San Francisco.

title: Danton
description: In 1794, Danton returns to Paris to see the Committee for Public Safety under Robespierre beginning mass executions.

title: Carmen
description: Antonio, the choreographer of a flamenco dance company, falls in love with his lead dancer Carmen, and their story begins to mirror the tragedy of Prosper Mérimée's novella.

title: Entre Nous
description: Two women, Lena and Madeleine, become close friends after World War II, but their friendship threatens their marriages.

title: Valley Girl
description: Julie, a girl from the valley, meets Randy, a punk from the city. They are from different worlds and find love. Somehow they need to stay together in spite of her friends.

title: Mr. Mom
description: After he's laid off, a husband switches roles with his wife. She returns to the workforce and he becomes a stay-at-home dad - a job he has no clue how to do.

title: Cujo
description: A friendly St. Bernard named "Cujo" contracts rabies and conducts a reign of terror on a small American town.

title: Twilight Zone: The Movie
description: Four horror and science fiction segments, directed by four famous directors, each of them being a new version of a classic story from Rod Serling's landmark television series.

title: Streamers
description: Four young recruits wait in their barracks to be sent to Vietnam.
